overview: A young, teen boy named Frank McCry is known for being a very wimpy intellectual at school. One day, a meteorite suddenly strikes near him, giving some unknown powers from its radius. Frank takes up the challenge to redeem himself for his confidence by protecting his city from threatening forces; as coincidentally, one rises.
tagline: A HERO ISN'T JUST BORN. THEY ARE REDEEMED.
title: The Origins of Sticky Guy
